metadata.title: CVE-2021-38012 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Type confusion in V8 in Google Chrome prior to 96.0.4664.45 allowed aremote attacker to potentially exploit heap corruption via a crafted HTMLpage.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
